title: [Large-Scale] Problem-Based Mathematics Learning Program for Irish SME Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic mathematical knowledge and work experience
context.additional_context: Development of customized learning environments for current practitioners to solve math-related problems encountered in the workplace

learning_goals: Learners effectively solve real-world mathematical problems in authentic work situations using PBL (Project-Based Learning) methods at an 80% success rate or higher.
Learners enhance their competency in solving complex mathematical problems by 70% through team-based collaboration.
Apply the learned content immediately to practical tasks to achieve at least three outcomes in cost reduction or efficiency improvement
Independently design and execute problem-solving processes using digital tools
Proactively lead peer knowledge-sharing activities at least once a week to foster a learning culture

resources: Customized Mathematics Case Database by Company

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
